string.value: Apparently #p9120011#'s doll just walked out and disappeared. I better check out this story.

#p9120011#'s doll apparently just walked out on her and disappeared. Maybe this has something to do with the #b#t4000144##k that #p1012109# is looking for. I should go to #b#p1012109##k's place and talk to him.
#b#p1012109##k seems to catch on to something here.

I have to say thanks for helping me fix that doll the other day! What? where did it go? Well, for starters, it woke up by itself, and then flew away, Now this is shocking... and I won't be giving out hairs either. Please help me find the dolls! ESPECIALLY one that I got from my dad.
Thank you so much for your help! But, I have no idea where it went... #b#p1012109##k of Henesys is apparently writing a book on monsters, and ... maybe he knows~
I'm sorry I asked for too much. Are you stil busy? If you got some time, then please help me out. Please...
Hey, how was it? Did you find #b#t4000144##k?
What? That ... hmmm ... the reason behind this concerns me, but...
Please ask #b#p1012109##k of Henesys whatever happened to my doll, if he knows what's going on.
